title: Overloaded
data:
{{obsolete}}

An [[encumbered]] character who continued picking up items would have eventually become '''overloaded''' instead, suffering the following:
*Cannot climb [[stairs]]
*+3 to [[movement]] delay
*+5 [[hunger]] per action
*[[Stealth]] is divided by 5
*Slows [[Unarmed Combat]]

==History==
In [[0.15]], the overloaded status effect (and item weight in general) was removed.

[[Category:Status effects]]
[[Category:Movement]]
